subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Ryan Briscoe gave Team Penske its fourth straight pole on the 3.4-mile, 11-turn Watkins Glen International, supplanting his veteran teammate Hélio Castroneves. A broken throttle cable sent Castroneves to the rear of the 26-car field for Sunday’s race.
